title: Digital Circle Watch Face
summary: BL3CK FACE: Digital-Analog modern watch face for android Wear
description: ★★★★  a special gift by BL3CK Face ★★★★Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)Android Wear 5.0x CompliantWatch face features:★ Time (Analog and Digital dial)★ Date, month, year ★ Absolute bl3k background to preserve battery drain ★  Dimmed mode almost the same as normal viewMore•  Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store•  Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection. Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
descriptionHTML:
★★★★ a special gift by BL3CK Face ★★★★

Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)
Android Wear 5.0x Compliant

Watch face features:
★ Time (Analog and Digital dial)
★ Date, month, year
★ Absolute bl3k background to preserve battery drain
★ Dimmed mode almost the same as normal view

More
• Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store
• Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection.
Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
comments: Love design...needs fine tuning android wear app states there is a settings app available for this face but just brings back to face download...a settings app is a great idea for all watch faces! Time out settings, date, etc...
Poor battery life Uses 27% of battery,, according to Battery Mix. Had to put watch on the charger twice today. Attractive design.
Awesome look And I'd pay to get customization options.
Love it!!! It was my fav watch face. I had to return my Moto 360 and I got Asus Zenwatch instead. Any chance of a square version of this for my new watch? Would love to use it again.
